messages.message:
Good news!

As of this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69968) PR, `master` is now 100% on mypy 1.11.2.

Upgrading mypy has been something that we've wanted to do for years now,  Upgrading mypy allows us to do things like use `typing.TypedDict` instead of `mypy_extensions` , type-checking pydantic models and `ParamSpecs` , pinning third party-stubs versions, and so much more.

Thank you so much for doing this @Victor Zeng !! Weâ€™ve been putting this off for so long because every upgrade requires auditing and fixing the whole code base, thanks for taking this up yourself! This is a great step towards making the impending python upgrade easier (fyi @Ashish )! 

@Victor Zeng++
:thumbsup_all: @Victor Zeng leveled up, now has 2 karma
thanks Victor! Really appreciate the hard work here.
:thumbsup_all: @Victor Zeng leveled up, now has 3 karma
